title: First Pick
body:
Love getting first pick 13/20 of my last games and then picking Fiora and getting immediately counterpicked by Ryze who walks me down lvl 1 with autos and w. Love having to play a thirty minute game where it doesn't matter how good I play, just to lose cause I can't walk near the enemy laner or minions.

Fun game.

replies.body: It sounds like you haven't learned to ban Ryze or play around his abilities. Once you learn the moveset and his limitations, playing against him becomes a lot easier, even for melee championns like Fiora, Garen, Yorick, etc. etc.

> [{quoted}](name=TTVTheSeraphKing,realm=NA,application-id=GgNYATV4,discussion-id=dHho1MFm,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-09-29T03:57:51.084+0000)
>
> It sounds like you haven't learned to ban Ryze or play around his abilities. Once you learn the moveset and his limitations, playing against him becomes a lot easier, even for melee championns like Fiora, Garen, Yorick, etc. etc.

You USED To be able to play around ryze. Now that his E perma bounces he just lane bullies you into oblivion and never runs out of mana due to a 750 gold item (starting with {{item:1027}} ) Ryze is unfun to play against and needs to just be removed

It's not that he needs to be removed. You just need to learn how to play around him. I do it quite easily by picking champions that greater cast range that can keep him at a distance. Anivia and Annie are both good at this (though I think Annie has a slightly smaller cast range than Ryze). If you can't play around his abilities and learn his weaknesses, then I recommend either banning him or start playing him yourself.
